channel.title: Array error
channel.description:
Whenever I add a new Silabs monster I get this when i run my server. Then i cant log into the server. I hope someone can tell me how to make my server handle npc id's that high.
I tried spawning NPCid 4980 which is brutal green dragon. [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Array IndexOutOfBoundsException: 4980 at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:1382) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1132) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:428) at server.main(server.java:97)[/code]
I'm using a Devolution(Dodian) base server. Silabs.

item.title: Array error
item.dc:creator: @bloodymouth bloodymouth
item.description:
@bloodymouth wrote:

Ive never leeched. My keybaord doesnt even have a C key and my mouse only has 1 button. And my dodian using silabs is fine. It does everything a normal one can do, and more.

Read full topic

item.title: Array error
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“madgamer, post:4, topic:180772”][quote author=s p i d a z link=topic=242113.msg2048248#msg2048248 date=1202796957]
okay wait… your using silabs… yet dodian source… good luck adding/finding/making… (for you that means leeching) good codes:)
[/quote]

just because they don’t have rep or are junior members doesn’t mean that they’ll have to leech everything to get anywhere[/quote] 90% of the people come here to l33ch im guessing from the way this one is talking that he is a leecher and im probably right
